english.segment1: Soon and very soon. My King is coming. Robed in righteousness and crowned with love. When I see Him. I shall be made like Him. Soon and very soon
english.segment2: Soon and very soon. Ill be going. To the place He has prepared for me. There my sin erased. My shame forgotten. Soon and very soon
english.segment3: I will be with the One I love. With unveiled face Ill see Him. There my soul will be satisfied. Soon and very soon
english.segment4: Soon and very soon. See the procession. The angels and the elders 'round the throne. At His feet Ill lay my crowns My worship. Soon and very soon
english.segment5: I will be with the One I love. With unveiled face Ill see Him. There my soul will be satisfied. Soon and very soon
english.segment6: Though I have not seen Him. My heart knows Him well. Jesus Christ the Lamb. The Lord of heaven
english.segment7: I will be with the One I love. With unveiled face Ill see Him. There my soul will be satisfied. Soon and very soon. Soon and very soon
